abstract: Cisco and EMC found a true technology industry veteran to head their virtualization-focused joint venture, Acadia.
snippet: Cisco and EMC found a true technology industry veteran to head their virtualization-focused joint venture, Acadia.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems, EMC, VMware and Intel have found their virtualization man. His name is Michael Capellas.

headline.main: Ex-Compaq Chief Capellas Lands at Cisco-EMC Joint Venture
